text: @piersmorgan I could counter that argument with, if Labour had won the GE and were in power, and if they in turn had to handle the Covid-19 pandemic with similar death stats, testing kits and PPE problems, would Labour be held to the same level of scrutiny and partisan blind party loyalty?
